column5: literally hit a brick wall ------at 1:50 am on the night of October 23
column7: just off National Road No. 2 in the village of West Prek Ho
column9: Takhmao City. Kandal province. ------According to the source
column10: the car failed to take a bend in the road
column11: and instead ended up ploughing into the wall
column12: making a nice shape and ruining the car.------After the incident
column13: the driver legged it before the local authorities arrived at the location. The Lexus was taken away by Kandal Provincial Police
column14: waiting for the owner to come to arrange a legal settlement.------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/40491
